summary: Provides an integration layer for sending operational events from the Litellm framework to the Lunary observability platform. Includes a logger class that formats and records messages, tool calls, and usage metrics, along with helper utilities for sanitizing and extracting relevant data from LLM interactions.
business_intent: Enable developers to capture, clean, and forward language model request/response data to Lunary for monitoring, analytics, and debugging of AI applications.
